headline: Dave Ramsey Tells Woman On $100K Salary, Left With 20 Acres And 6 Animals, 'You're Sitting On A Half-Million-Dollar Windfall'
summary: Rebecca called to ask for advice after her relationship ended, leaving her with a $1 million 20-acre ranch and six animals. She told financial expert Dave Ramsey on "The Ramsey Show" that she's now the one taking care of the property alone. "You're ...
